items.quote: “OptimalShip is an excellent place to work, the opportunity to gain experience and learn different skills that can help you throughout your career are only a few of the benefits of working here. The flexible schedule and work culture are outstanding at Optimal. We have great leadership; they want to see their staff succeed and appreciate the importance of work/life balance.”
items.author: Sherice Romero, employee of 9 years

items.quote: “Working for OptimalShip has taught me a lot of very practical skills that can be used anywhere. I have gained better confidence in holding phone conversations, especially on how to speak proficiently in a business manner. I have been better equipped on how to listen, overcome objections, and find solutions to problems. I have been grateful for the flexible schedule that can work great around classes. It is focused work, so you go in and do your job without having to worry about the stress of having to take over someone else’s workload. I have enjoyed my time working here!”
items.author: Anders Nelson, employee of 2 years

items.quote: “I have gained experience holding professional conversations in a business setting and responding to emails in a formal manner. This will help me in any future position I hold as part of my career or in any other professional setting.”
items.author: Benet Balamonte, employee of XXXX years
